pages.text: The respawner is an item similar in appearance to a bone wand. This item, that will also need to be enchanted with Time Reversal similarly to the bone wand, will allow a player to respawn animals in the prehistoric dimensions in a limited range around the player. Simply right clicking with the item in hand will force this respawning to take place.

Each time a player right clicks it will have a chance to spawn biome appropriate animals in the area, with a chance that it might fail. WARNING: repetitive right click will force the respawn of creatures in the area each time, which might cause lag.
The respawner also works anywhere, overworld, nether, end, modded dimensions. It will also spawn any mob spawnable in the place where you use it, vanilla and other modded mobs too.
